item.title: On the South African road incorrectly identified as a 'burial site' by Trump
item.description: The US president said video of crosses on the road was evidence of the scale of attacks on white farmers.

item.title: Denmark to raise retirement age to highest in Europe
item.description: From 2040, Danish people born after 31 December 1970 will be eligible to retire at 70 years old.

item.title: What we know about the Israeli embassy staff shooting
item.description: Police say the victims, a young couple, were shot by a man who shouted "free, free Palestine".

item.title: US Supreme Court blocks public funding for religious charter school
item.description: A split Supreme Court ruling upholds a lower court decision that prohibited Oklahoma from establishing the nation's first Christian charter school.

item.title: UK signs Â£101m-a-year deal to hand over Chagos Islands
item.description: Under the deal, the UK will lease back the Diego Garcia military base from Mauritius.
